body.name: Sooez 12 Pack Pencil Erasers, Cute Erasers Pencil Eraser with Clean up Roller Pencil Eraser Shaving Roller Case Erasers for Party Favors Gift Supplies
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 3 hrs 21 mins
features: Amazing function cute eraser: Sooez roller Pencil Erasers work well for its main purpose as an eraser. The opposite of eraser is roller which picks up the eraser "shavings" into its little garbage area, which is not only keeps your room tidy but also a great fun for the work. Nice and cute school supplies for kids.

Cute and adorable cool erasers: Super cute animal pictures Pencil Erasers, they are really sweet. Great choice for you, as gift, and used these as favors at a party, specially fit an animal theme party great.
Great quality kids erasers: Made from environment and non-toxic material, safe and durable to use, remove the pencil marks smoothly and easily. These are perfect for student in school and home.
Package content: Comes with 12 Pack of roller erasers in 12 different adorable styles, which is enough for you to use and share with your classmates and friends.

Products size: 2 Kinds of size cute erasers, they are 2.4*1.2 Inch (6 Pack), and 2.0*1.2 Inch (6 Pack). You can buy an eraser of the same size to replace if you want to use it again after it runs out. Tips: When you are using your eraser, please hold a part of the white eraser with your fingers (this is the correct operation method) to prevent the eraser from being squeezed out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My kids love them and their friends love them too
reviews.reviewText: These erasers are a hit in my house and my kid's school. They are cute, delete well, and kids love the clean up roller. Since we received them, these have been the only erasers both my girls use. They say they receive a lot of compliments on these erasers and questions about where you can buy them. I ordered these as small presents for our Christmas calendar and have been very happy with them. These erasers make a small, fun present that is both cute and useful for kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clever idea for the OCD...
reviews.reviewText: I never knew such a thing like this existed until my daughter told me about them and showed me how hers worked that she got from school. I was amazed at what a clever concept this eraser was when it comes to those annoying eraser shavings. So messy!! And anything that helps minimizes a mess, I'm all in! I'm a sucker for all things cute, and the cute little animals that are on these sealed the deal. Super cute! And they work surprisingly well. I would definitely recommend these. They are very reasonable in price and would make great for grab bags, party favors, classrooms, etc. Simply a clever, cute, effective product :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These erasers are super fun. the little eraser roller is adorable and satisfying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loved these. She uses them for school and all her friends wanted some. They are very cute and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The roller needs to be cleaned with water
reviews.reviewText: All of them are cute and the eraser works better than the pink erasers for school children but maybe not as good as the ones from Korea or Japan. Nevertheless, the price is good and the kids I gave it to, including my own kids, loved it very much. The different animals are true to color and shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These erasers are darling. I placed a regular sized post it, next to the erasers for size.Some of the smaller erasers have a roller to pick up the eraser bits.These are great for class gifts or craft fairs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my friends since they like kawaii stuff they loved a lot and it works! Loved it so much. But you might have to clean the roller part woth your finger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for kids
reviews.reviewText: My kids loved these comes with plenty to share and they work great
